entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
